title: cmd/gc: "arguments of comparison must be lvalues" in switch
body:
What does 'go version' print?
go version devel +3d68989bd1ea Mon Oct 27 08:46:18 2014 -0700 linux/amd64

What steps reproduce the problem?
http://play.golang.org/p/hN65SqEU7D
(Run with tip.)

What happened?
./main.go:15: internal compiler error: arguments of comparison must be lvalues

What should have happened instead?
No error (as 1.3).
